titleInfo.title: Tribute - Audio architects of the Nashville Sound: Audio Engineering Society Lifetime Achievement Awards - 2018-07-01

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Nashville chapter of the Audio Engineering Society pays tribute with the Lifetime Achievement awards to live sound engineer Richard Hargett, technical engineer Claude Hill, mastering engineer George Ingram, live recording engineer Johnny Rosen, and technical engineer Tom Sparkman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 1, 2018. Includes selected recorded excerpts and audio from video. Master of Ceremonies is Mike Porter.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
